name: Faesun
description:
The Story Thus Far...

Faesun is a 3D Musou brawler with parkour elements. It focuses on a group of 6 friends, lovers, ex-lovers and kin navigating reconstruction after a God-King Patriarch, Fahweh Khaos, is banished from the universe.

What happens to the people left in the wake of a mad god's plan to destroy the universe? How will players navigate the social schisms in society brought on by a calamity? How will they handle his potential return?

in a universe where starlight is power, is truth,

a deity returns to collect what is his: a sun, Faesun,

from his beloved creations: living beings, Ponta people.

who will survive his scourge?

Controls

Please note this game is controller only at the moment. You can use most types of controllers!
If your controller is not read by the game, try unplugging it and plugging it back in!

For the time being, controls will be listed in their PlayStation format:

  • Left Thumbstick - Move
  • Right Thumbstick - Look Around
  • X - Jump
  • Square - Melee Attack Combo
  • Triangle - Ranged Attack
  • R1 + X,Square, Triangle, or Circle - Special Attack (WIP)
  • R2 - Sprint
  • L1 - Block
  • L1 + Left Thumbstick - Dodge in direction (Can dodge through enemy attacks and witch time!)
  • L2 - Wall Run
The Demo

This demo is a sandbox environment exploring some of the core verbs of Faesun, dodging, slashing, aerial, combat, and parkour. This is an alpha WIP!

Gameplay

Melee Combat is a careful dance of ranged attacks, close physical melee attacks.
